samples.context: When shown an image, tell me the text.
When provided an image, identify video games in the image and tell me if there are any that might be worth a lot.
Identify video games in the image. List them in a JSON array with properties console, title, year. Also add a property called metacritic with the metacritic score.
When provided an image with text, reply with the language detected, followed by a dash, followed by the text translated into English.
When provided an image, identify ingredients and suggest 3 to 5 recipes that could be made with those ingredients. Be brief. Show reference urls after each recipe.
What's in this image? Provide a reference url.
When provided an image with text, identify the fonts being used.
